main event: A civilian in Portland, Maine spotted a fast-moving light like a star in the sky.
interesting points: The object moved very fast across the sky at a high altitude.
The object traveled a straight path and faded away in 3-5 minutes.
There was no trail or sound associated with the object.
The light was the size of a star and appeared white in color.
The observation occurred at dusk, with a clear sky and unlimited visibility.
